description:
There is a number of grammar issues and typos in the API Guide source in Nova.
This bug report attempts to highlight the ones found on and around 2016-02-15 by me.

commit reviewed:
278b16e Jenkins on 1/21/16 at 4:09 AM (committed by Gerrit Code Review on 1/21/16 at 4:09 AM)
Merge "Make sure that we always have a parent_addr set"

Review link with proposed fix to follow shortly.
title: API Guide source grammar and typo fixes
